parametrized_description: An aquarium uses Otters and Dolphins to perform tricks. Each Otter performs OtterTricks at a time and requires OtterTreats treats per performance. Each Dolphin performs DolphinTricks at a time and requires DolphinTreats treats per performance. The aquarium must use at least MinDolphins Dolphins and ensure that no more than MaxOtterPercentage of the total performers are Otters. With a total of TotalTreats treats available, the objective is to maximize the total number of tricks performed.

OtterTricks.description: Number of tricks an otter can perform at a time

OtterTreats.description: Number of treats an otter requires to perform at a time

DolphinTricks.description: Number of tricks a dolphin can perform at a time

DolphinTreats.description: Number of treats a dolphin requires to perform at a time

MaxOtterPercentage.description: Maximum percentage of performers that can be otters

constraints.description: The number of Dolphins must be at least MinDolphins.
The number of Otters must not exceed MaxOtterPercentage of the total number of performers.
The total number of treats used by Otters and Dolphins must not exceed TotalTreats.

objective.description: Maximize the total number of tricks performed, which is the sum of OtterTricks multiplied by the number of Otters and DolphinTricks multiplied by the number of Dolphins.
